When changes are discovered in the status of a userâ€™s buddy, the WASP platform MUST sent out notifications according to the alerts set by the user.
A WASP application SHALL be able to set up phone call connections and video chat connections using the 3G Platform via the WASP platform.
The platform must be able to store POI profiles.
The WASP platform SHOULD be possible to determine the location of touristic attractions close to a calculated route.
The WASP platform SHOULD be possible to determine the location of touristic attractions.
